entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Port Colborne
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low zero.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight. Wind becoming west 30 km/h before morning. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Cloudy. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Clearing. High plus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023
